ProductInfo.Features:
Records real-time 30fps per channel (1440fps total at up to Full-D1) @ three resolutions: CIF, 2CIF, and 4CIF. Ideal for banks, jewelry stores, military facilities, casinos, or any other enterprise application that requires real-time recording at the highest possible resolution
Dual-stream encoding with fully adjustable remote sub-stream without sacrificing main-stream image quality
One additional VGA or BNC video output for Matrix in addition to 1080P Virtual Matrix using Eyefinity triple screen display option
Dongle Cables (octopus cables for video and audio inputs)
6000GB (6TB) Storage
ProductInfo.Name: 48 Channel 1440 FPS Real-Time at 4CIF H.264 Hybrid DVR Video Surveillance Server: eDigital D1-HC2 Platinum, 4U, i5, 3yr
